hero.title: About Tadbir
hero.description: A graduation project from the Information Technology Institute focused on revolutionizing time management for small businesses and restaurants.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Tadbir was born as a graduation project at the Information Technology Institute, created by a passionate team of developers who recognized a critical challenge facing small businesses and restaurants: effective time management.
story.paragraph2: We understood that small business owners spend countless hours on scheduling, attendance tracking, and leave management - time that could be better spent growing their business. Our solution automates these processes, helping businesses save time, reduce overhead costs, and focus on what truly matters.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower small businesses and restaurants with intelligent time management tools that simplify operations, boost productivity, and help them thrive in a competitive market.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading workforce management platform for small businesses across the region, making professional-grade time management accessible to everyone.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: We believe powerful tools should be easy to use. Our platform is designed with simplicity at its core.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.description: We help businesses save time and resources through intelligent automation and smart scheduling.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We're committed to delivering a reliable, high-quality platform that businesses can depend on.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously evolve our platform with the latest technology to meet our users' changing needs.
